content.rendered:
Facilities

Hotel Gym

The boutique gymnasium features all the standard equipment, from a treadmill to leg press.

Pool

Enjoy our large solar heated outdoor pool and spa. Perfect for some early morning laps of relaxing in the sun.

Please note pool is not heated 1 June – 15 September. Guest passes to Aqualink Nunawading, a short walk from the hotel,  can be obtained from reception.

Spa

Endota Spa is available to all guests located in the pool side area of the hotel. Indulge in one of the treatments or massages offered. Adding to the many relaxation options when staying at Canterbury International.

Garden Terrace

Enjoy the tranquil garden terrace, ideal for a sunny breakfast, afternoon beverage or welcoming your guests with canapes.
